Share Resource

{{ errorMessage }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { ResourceService } from '../../../Services/resource/resource.service'; import { Resource } from '../../../DTO/resource'; @Component({ selector: 'app-resource-share', templateUrl: './resource-share.component.html', styleUrls: ['./resource-share.component.css'] }) export class ResourceShareComponent { resource: Resource; constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute, private resourceService: ResourceService) { const resourceId = this.route.snapshot.params['id']; this.resource = this.resourceService.getResourceById(resourceId); } }
